go build -trimpath -o hello.exe hello.go
! grep -q $GOROOT hello.exe
! grep -q $WORK hello.exe

env GO111MODULE=on
go build -trimpath -o fortune.exe rsc.io/fortune
! grep -q $GOROOT fortune.exe
! grep -q $WORK fortune.exe

-- hello.go --
package main
func main() { println("hello") }

-- go.mod --
module m
